++ Fleur

[George]'s adopted daughter. Looks about 19, though she is older. She has shoulder length auburn hair, milk pale skin, and sky blue eyes.

she is about 165cm or 5'5", slender, human looking.

her passport says she was born 15-aug-1978. she went to school with [Melody], and then university. she has an IT degree.

Melody says Fleur is a fire elf, but her powers are considerable. she destroyed an entire city block when the Black Prince threatened to kill George.

George found her hiding in the woods at about age 9. she was fleeing a fire the destroyed a suburban home and 4 pornographers.
